tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ar_content_assets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(255),
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    campaign_id INT,
    file_path VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ar_content_assets (
	asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	asset_name VARCHAR(255),
	category VARCHAR(50),
	created_at TIMESTAMP,
	updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE media_files (
	file_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	file_name VARCHAR(255),
	file_type VARCHAR(50),
	file_size INT,
	uploaded_at TIMESTAMP,
	asset_id UUID,
	FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES ar_content_assets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AR_Content_Assets (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  asset_size INT NOT NULL,
  uploaded_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Media_Files (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  file_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  file_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  file_size INT NOT NULL,
  uploaded_by VARCHAR(100),
  uploaded_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Advertising_Campaigns (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE ARContentAssets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    file_path VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE MediaFiles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_size INT,
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    upload_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE AdvertisingCampaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignAssets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    asset_id INT,
    position VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES AdvertisingCampaigns(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES ARContentAssets(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_content_assets (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    asset_url VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE media_files (
    file_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    file_size INT,
    file_url VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE advertising_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_assets (
    campaign_asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    file_id INT,
    added_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES advertising_campaigns(campaign_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES ar_content_assets(content_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES media_files(file_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_scheduling (
    scheduling_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    day_of_week VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES advertising_campaigns(campaign_id)
);
